data.name: TwinWorld
data.description:
Create, enjoy, and share a new realm beyond reality!
TwinWorld is a metaverse platform where anyone can easily decorate their own space, enjoy it with others, and unfold endless possibilities within mixed reality.
Whether it's playing chess, drawing, creating exhibition spaces, or collaborating, you can indulge in anything your imagination allows with other people.
Recent items now come with a range of physical attributes, elevating your experience through activities like mini-golf, object tossing, and zero-gravity adventures. And the best part? Creating outstanding spaces can earn you reward coins that are exchangeable for real-world coupons!

*We've added physical features to our items to make them feel more realistic.
* Multiplayer is supported, allowing up to 10 people in the same space.
* You can upload your own 3D object and view it with others.
* Customize your own space with countless 3D items.
* Create audio items using your voice or music.
* Draw simple 3D pictures.
*If you create outstanding spaces, you can earn reward coins that are exchangeable for real-world coupons.
* Most importantly, TwinWorld will continue to evolve!
